resources.string: You’re starting to hear the language in a new way. You observe, memorize, and try your first phrases. This is the foundation your confidence will be built on. Welcome to the beginning!
You’re not just listening anymore — you’re entering a dialogue. You can keep a conversation going, ask questions, and express yourself. Communication is becoming more natural.
Your thoughts are becoming clearer, you choose words easily and build logical speech. You’re no longer lost in language — you’re in control. Speaking is now your comfort zone.
You can tell a story in a way that holds attention. You work with intonation, structure, and emotion. Words are no longer just information — they carry meaning.
You sound convincing, calm, and expressive. You can improvise, persuade, and lead the conversation. Your speech is a tool you truly master.
Your speech is an art form. You use language consciously, precisely, and masterfully. This level opens after significant progress.
